1_17i7Y7r8nTaCfLbCAuaKyc4R5BbKZYU2Hr.body: It seems inevitable to me since block-chains going viral, the rise of cooperatives, the widespread use of community currencies, increasing interest in ideas like universal income, and the fact that people are paying attention to progressive candidates again shows that this is already happening.

> [nippletwister](#comment_3_1PvAyLAB5H1JKbiFjx95ZJXrNJVyWxs5Hf): Yes, but that is too slow, and crisis goes faster.

Good Point. This is why I think deeper economic collapse will help many more libertarians and progressives get heard even though video-games, religion, and sports tend to cause larger changes than business or politics.
